body_html:
For tf.slim: tf.slim is a contrib package. All contrib packages will be removed in tf 2.0. CF https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/m/#!msg/announce/qXfsxr2sF-0/jHQ77dr3DAAJ

Also, tf.slim is depreciated. Cf the msg earlier in this issue by @tfboyd.

For tf.layers: François Chollet stated that in TF 2.0, tf.layers will be removed. Since he is working at google closely with the TF team, I think he knows what he is talking about. Cf: #14703.

Also, tf.slim is depreciated. Cf the msg earlier in this issue by @tfboyd.
For tf.layers: François Chollet stated that in TF 2.0, tf.layers will be removed. Since he is working at google closely with the TF team, I think he knows what he is talking about. Cf: #14703.
body:
For tf.slim: tf.slim is a contrib package. All contrib packages will be removed in tf 2.0. CF https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/m/#!msg/announce/qXfsxr2sF-0/jHQ77dr3DAAJ

Also, tf.slim is depreciated. Cf the msg earlier in this issue by @tfboyd.

For tf.layers: François Chollet stated that in TF 2.0, tf.layers will be removed. Since he is working at google closely with the TF team, I think he knows what he is talking about. Cf: #14703.
